summary: Completed frontend testing for font size and layout changes. All requested changes verified working: 1) Explanation banner text changed from text-sm to text-base on all pages (Wallet, Investment, Store, Quests, Learn), 2) Wallet page has compact layout with Total Balance and Transfer button on same row, 3) Transfer button renamed to 'Transfer Between Jars', 4) Wallet banner now explains transfer functionality with 'move money between jars' text, 5) Dashboard wallet section text sizes updated to text-base.
passed_tests: ✅ Wallet page banner text is text-base (16px) - verified larger font
✅ Wallet page banner mentions 'move money between jars' explaining transfer
✅ Wallet page banner explains 'like putting coins from your spending jar into your savings jar!'
✅ Transfer button text is 'Transfer Between Jars' (not 'Transfer Money')
✅ Wallet page has compact layout - Total Balance and Transfer button on same row (flex-col sm:flex-row)
✅ Compact balance bar uses gradient background (from-[#3D5A80] to-[#5A7BA0])
✅ Dashboard wallet description text is text-base: 'Your ₹ is organized in 4 special jars. Tap any jar to see more or move money between them!'
✅ Dashboard wallet card account type name is text-base (e.g., 'spending', 'savings')
✅ Investment page banner text is text-base
✅ Store page banner text is text-base
✅ Quests page banner text is text-base
✅ Learn page banner text is text-base

test_credentials.note: Test user created and cleaned up after testing

seed_data_creation: Temporary test user with wallet accounts created for testing, then cleaned up.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All font size changes from text-sm to text-base verified on explanation banners across Wallet, Investment, Store, Quests, and Learn pages. Wallet page now has compact horizontal layout with Total Balance on left and 'Transfer Between Jars' button on right. The wallet banner explains the transfer feature with child-friendly language about moving money between jars.
